law.catch_line: If a written protest against a rule or regulation is filed in accordance with § 21-240 or § 21-241...
law.text:
If a written protest against a rule or regulation is filed in accordance with § 21-240 or § 21-241 of this subtitle, the Secretary shall hold a public hearing:
To receive evidence on the issues raised by the protest; and
To hear any interested person.
